messages.subject: unfortunately off topic re: My purpose in being on this list
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/14/01 10:15:02 AM, rumpleteasermom@juno.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/14/01 10:15:02 AM, rumpleteasermom@... writes:

<< Of course there was that beauty by you accusing me of not knowing
myself:#25181

> And while I've gotten too irked to read many of her messages, I
> understand where Bridgett is coming from. It's (hopefully) the last
great
> stance. For me it's sort of like peeling layers, and frightfully
hanging onto
> that last one...afraid of what's *really* underneath. >>

I didn't write that.
Perhaps you were slamming back at Brenda as well?

I wish you would stop slamming at anyone and talk about unschooling or just
read about unschooling (as you first said you would do--read a few days
before you jumped on us).

Sandra



Sandra
